name: All-In-One Summer Sports VR
abstract: Various summer sports on the tropical island( 11 sports in 1 )

detail.app_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, Traditional Chinese, German, Russian, Japanese, French, Korean, Dutch, Portuguese, Polish, Spanish, Italian
detail.app_release_note:
All In One Summer Sports VR Ver 0.5.0 Update

Hello, dear players.

In this version, various improvements and bug fixes have been made.

Here are the main updates:

1. Water Park Movement Improvement
   The character movement in Water Park mode has been improved to be more natural and intuitive.

2. Fishing Matchmaking Bug Fix
   The matchmaking issues in the fishing mode have been fixed. Problems that some users encountered during the matchmaking process in the previous version have been resolved, providing a smoother multiplayer experience. You can now enjoy fishing tournaments with your friends without any matchmaking failures or disconnections.

3. Clay Shooting Bug Fix
   The bug that caused the game to freeze when exiting immediately after starting the clay shooting mode has been resolved. Now, even if you exit the game early, you can restart it normally, and this issue will no longer cause any inconvenience.
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO 4, PICO Neo3 Link, PICO 4 Pro, PICO Neo3 Pro, PICO 4 Ultra
